publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2627 Mr Mike Rumbles: BSc Course in Audiology-That the Parliament notes that Queen Margaret University College in Edinburgh has expressed an interest in developing a BSc course in Audiology; recognises that at present there is no school of audiology for Scotland; further recognises that there is a serious lack of trained audiologists to implement the use of digital hearing aid technology across Scotland, and considers that the Scottish Executive should give its support to Queen Margaret University College to develop and implement this course.
S1M-2627 BSc Course in Audiology (lodged on 21 January 2002) Robin Harper*, Shona Robison*

S1M-2627 BSc Course in Audiology (lodged on 21 January 2002) Fiona Hyslop*, Alex Neil*, Robert Brown*, John Farquhar Munro*, Michael Matheson*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Richard Lochhead*, Brian Adam*, Margaret Jamieson*, Fiona McLeod*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-2627 BSc Course in Audiology (lodged on 21 January 2002) Mary Scanlon*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Irene McGugan*

S1M-2627 Mr Mike Rumbles: BSc Course in Audiology-That the Parliament notes that Queen Margaret University College in Edinburgh has expressed an interest in developing a BSc course in Audiology; recognises that at present there is no school of audiology for Scotland; further recognises that there is a serious lack of trained audiologists to implement the use of digital hearing aid technology across Scotland, and considers that the Scottish Executive should give its support to Queen Margaret University College to develop and implement this course. Supported by: Robin Harper, Shona Robison, Fiona Hyslop, Alex Neil, Robert Brown, John Farquhar Munro, Michael Matheson, Cathie Craigie, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Richard Lochhead, Brian Adam, Margaret Jamieson, Fiona McLeod, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mary Scanlon, Mr Adam Ingram, Irene McGugan, Nora Radcliffe*, Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2627 BSc Course in Audiology (lodged on 21 January 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Mr George Reid*
S1M-2627 BSc Course in Audiology (lodged on 21 January 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-2627 BSc Course in Audiology (lodged on 21 January 2002) Mr Murray Tosh*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2627 BSc Course in Audiology (lodged on 21 January 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S1M-2627 BSc Course in Audiology (lodged on 21 January 2002) Ian Jenkins*
S1M-2627 BSc Course in Audiology (lodged on 21 January 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2627 BSc Course in Audiology (lodged on 21 January 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*
